script: There is a Playground in the center of my hometown.
About 3 km North of the Playground there is a Library
I visited Retail Area, which is 1 KM, East from Library.
I visited High Street, which is 2 KM, East from Retail Area.
About 2 km West of the High Street there is a Park
And finally there is Hospital which is South from Park and 4 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from {origin} to {place} following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Playground, go 3km North to Library.
From Library, go 1km East to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 2km East to High Street.
From High Street, go 2km West to Park.
From Park, go 4km South to Hospital.
